name: Reversi 8 x 8 <-->
description:
Please note: This app is free, cool gameplay and optimized user interaction.

The objective of this game is simple : The player with the most pieces on the board at the end of the game wins. The game is classed as finished when there are no spaces left on the board or there are no more possible legal moves for either competitor.

Turn over your opponent's pieces to take over the board.
Trap other pieces between your own to capture them, but be aware that the opponent may do the same.
The winner is the one with the most pieces when no more pieces can be played on the board.

Also known as Othello, where players continue to move alternately until they get to the end of the game and a winner is decided. This decision is reached by identifying which of the two opponents has the most pieces on the board.

Game Features :-

* Awesome gameplay
* Clean UI
* Nice music and sound effects
* Cool animations
* Play with AI or with your friends
* No IAP, free and much more....

No time limit! Enjoy this classic game of skill and strategy and have fun....
